title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Nov 5 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Nov 5 2021
description:
Mind-blowing from the NYT editorial page: Hey, Democrats, Go Woke, Go Broke. Buck says don’t think of them as journalists, think of them as activists. Arrest illustrates how the Steele dossier was a political dirty trick orchestrated by Hillary Clinton. WH: Biden flip flops on giving $450,000 to illegal aliens. Clay wonders if they are letting Biden make decisions: "It's scary." C&B welcome to the show, Ryan Girdusky, author of They're Not Listening: How the Elites Created the National Populist Revolution, and founder of the 1776 Project PAC. How can parents fight back against Critical Race Theory? Indiana school administrator: "When we tell you Critical Race Theory isn't taught in our schools we're lying."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
